infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location when in use to help end the corona virus pandemic quickly. Only a broad approxiation of the location is available to the public.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses your location when its in the background to help end the corona virus pandemic quickly. Only a broad approxiation of the location is available to the public.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses your location as long as its installed to help end the corona virus pandemic quickly. Only a broad approxiation of the location is available to the public.
